title.narrative: Community Action and Support for Education (CASE)

description.narrative: The Community Action and support for Education (CASE) is a three-year (3) UK Aid Match funded project, implemented by Hope for Children and partners Regional Advisory Network Information Systems (RAINS) and Northern Network for Education Development (NNED) in Northern Ghana. RAINS are the sole in country partner for the final period of the project. The website of the project is: https://www.hope-for-children.org/case

activity-date.narrative: It was started on 1 May 2018 and ended on 31 March 2021

recipient-country.narrative: 100% of the projects budget are committed to this project, with 67% of funds are spent in Ghana through our partners RAINS and NNED. only 27% is spent through our UK HQ for MEL, Project support and Admin.
